page.title: 08INDUSTRIAL SITE NAIRN
page.content:
On the A96 to the east of{Nairn}is the {Balmakeith}industrial site.The site has 16 units,of which 13 are occupied and was a fund assisted project by the {E.E.C. Regional Development Board.}The units are occupied by:- R&E HENDERSONS,Retail cars and car repairs,employing 9 and on site for 6\ years. LIEBNITZ&LANN,Electronic engineers,employing 22 and on site for 4\ years. IAN READ,Joiner,employing 1 and on site for 8 months. RHYDON UPHOLSTERY,Service electricial, employing 8 and on site for 3 years. C&M REWINDS,Motor rewinders,employing 7,and on site for 2\ years. INSIDE STORY,Curtain makers,employing 8 and on site for over 1 year. WEST PARK CABINS,Portacabins assemblers employing 5,and on site for 6 months.
{ }
